text: 16.15: 1 Sml 16.7; Sng 7.9; Snd 6.16-17; Mt 23.28; Ru 10.29; 18.9-14Mbe Zisas garim, ana khaŋ mbe nzuai, “Nde kha ndɨkndɨgi ga mbui ntɨɨri ma. Nde khueŋ vuzvugi, kha gumgi gu mbigi za kha ndɨkndɨgar nden muunga, nde tɨvi vhuuiŋ ga mbui ntɨɨri ma. Nde mba ndɨkndɨgar wari ga mbuim, Fhe Bakɨme, ana nde ndavi vherir zorga ki ndɨkndɨgi, ana nta kaŋgi. Mba ndɨkndɨgi, kha gumgi gu mbigi kha ndɨkndɨgar nta mbui, nta ndɨkndɨgi vhuuiŋ ma. Mbe mba ndɨkndɨgar nta mbuim, Fhe Bakɨme nta gari, nta guigira ndɨkndɨgi mbatɨgi ma.
